Publications

Papers

  • Chao-Han Tsai, I-No Liao, Chatrpol Pakasiri, Hsin-Cheng Pan, Yu-Jiu Wang, “A Wideband 20 mW UHF Rectifier in CMOS”, IEEE Microw. Wireless Compon. Lett., vol. 25, no. 6, pp. 388-390, Jun. 2015.

Patents
